Reviews.Title: Good Features Crap Phone
Reviews.Author: Peter D "pdesil"
Reviews.Content: So after owning this phone for about 2 months the keyboard just up and quit on me. So I had to use the screen to type out message which was fine but the keyboard was a selling point of the phone. The Operating System tends to have lots of lag and after owning it for about 6 months there we so many glitches on this phone It was nearly unusable. The features on it are neat which is the only reason why it got a 3 star rating but without them it would have taken an easy 1. I do not recommend this phone though because you can get better ones for less

Reviews.Title: DUD!
Reviews.Author: Jeterra T Cooper
Reviews.Content: If you want to spend your money on something that doesn't work, is out dated and difficult to set up... this is the phone for you.  You would be better off going to a local Sprint Store and buying a referbished smart phone from them for about the same price.

Reviews.Title: Phone is a Refurb not new as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wish the phone was new as advertised and not a refurb.  While looking in the set-up it displays the refurb date.  Phone looks nice and seems to function somewhat normal.  It does however not have the capability to connect to any tower faster than edge speeds.

Reviews.Title: bad phone no voice volume
Reviews.Author: larry bowen
Reviews.Content: I received the Sprint HTC Touch Pro phone and had Sprint transfer  my phone # to it. The phone worked but the volume was low on calls. Took the phone to Sprint to see if we were doing something wrong or if updating its program could fix the low volume problem. Sprint informed me there was a bad circuit in it and it coulden't be repaired.Amazon did return my money, thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: Kristen K. Thomas
Reviews.Content: CRAPPY-CUTS OFF AT LEAST 17 TIMES A DAY DO NOT BUY IF YOU DON'T HAVE TO...RETURNING MY PHONE AS WE SPEAK

Reviews.Title: Never buy this
Reviews.Author: Richard Bowden
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my sister. When we went to the provider to activate it on the plan we have, they worked and worked with it. First of all, they said the calibration was way off. Second you could type for instance a 2 and 5 would come up. The same applied to the letters. I was so embarrassed and disgusted.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I did not like this phone I had problems with it after three days of using and had to return it I do not recommend purchasing this item !!!!

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Purchase two, one of the two was broken.The sprint store advised this is old technology.The item is bulky and my second phone gave out within 6-7 months.

Reviews.Title: My first smart phone and I'm quite satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Martinsony25
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone and I have to say that I'm very satisfied with it; the only hiccup is that it's a little slow at times. But other than that I love it for being my first smart phone!

Reviews.Title: It was a Decent phone and price..!!!
Reviews.Author: Angellemus1986
Reviews.Content: I Didnt really used it for that long but,It was an Ok phone for the price i paid for..!!! Ok

Reviews.Title: htc purchase
Reviews.Author: marie mangum
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone it was clean and functional,after a week battery will not charge,when I took it to sprint they no longer carry a charger for ,basicly I have a phone that I can't use.

Reviews.Title: The screen has broken in the second day
Reviews.Author: MA DE TEZANOS PINTO
Reviews.Content: It has fallen from my hands to the table (I was seated having dinner) and the screen has broken. No resistance

Reviews.Title: not really feelin this
Reviews.Author: lorenzo donald
Reviews.Content: the cell was 100% charged and after not being used for less than 4hrs the cell died anyways. i have downloaded ringtones and none of them have been put into ringtones in cell

Reviews.Title: Misleading  advertisement
Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: Customer made to assume product  is useable.. In this case ...it is not !  Sprint said  they are not able to activate. Sprint said Product  is  outdated.. ! I would reallyask  Amazon  to  insist  on sellers  of products like that..to make sure they can be used,, What is the purpose of buying a product  you cannot use.  I would like a refund please!

Reviews.Title: Very Quick Shipping
Reviews.Author: sabrina310
Reviews.Content: Thank you for the quick shipping, I hated this phone, The internet didn't hardly work, I was never able to use the gps, my phone would just turn itself off and on all on its own and I had a hard time getting it to turn back on.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Derrick
Reviews.Content: First let me say this review is based on my experience but I've heard similar reviews.  The product never allowed me to power it on, I couldn't charge it with the wrong charger which arrived with the phone.  I wanted to like but there just wasn't anything to like about this product.

Reviews.Title: awful phone
Reviews.Author: bpryor
Reviews.Content: This phone was totally not what the description said had nothing but problems with it.  The touch screen didn't work even with the stylus and calls and texts never came through terrible product

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: Katie Chase-Vanzago
Reviews.Content: I rather be phoneless then to have to use this phone.  I was looking for something not too expensive didn't have to have any features, thought I thought the full keyboard would be nice.  The keyboard's key are hard and close together plus phone doesn't stay illuminated long enough to finish text message.  Dont buy it a flip phone would be a billion times better.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: davine woodard
Reviews.Content: pretty good phone slow at times but does supply my needs all i need is a phone that i can text and call and this is which helps that.

Reviews.Title: Not delivered clean as promised
Reviews.Author: Sang-Hoon Kim
Reviews.Content: The phone had some text messages from prior use.  I had to delete these and who knows what else was in here cause the phone barely works properly.  Either the windows OS just sucks or there was some severe damage to the phone cause it barely works other than the basic calling feature.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Franklin
Reviews.Content: Touch screen not fully responsive, phone works by itself deciding on which applications to use. total reset does not work. screen is flimsy

Reviews.Title: i love this phone
Reviews.Author: kimberly gary
Reviews.Content: great features came in before estimated delievery date i cant complain i reccomed this phone to every one and it even comes with a sytlist pen it has a business look its great

Reviews.Title: I thought it had a sim card slot. Not good
Reviews.Author: Dimitri
Reviews.Content: When I bought this, I thought it had a sim card slot but as it turned out, it does not have at all. So I used it as a little compiuter.

Reviews.Title: Sprint Phone
Reviews.Author: gwen
Reviews.Content: The part you plug the charger in was bent. So I could never charge the phone. Tried several time the took phone to Sprint stores would cost more to repair phone than necnssary

Reviews.Title: very outdated
Reviews.Author: loniel williams
Reviews.Content: would have loved the phone in an earlier decade im all set in 2013. i hope i can get my money back

Reviews.Title: NOT GREAT
Reviews.Author: Elielite
Reviews.Content: this was a good phone but the glitches started to be crazy, it would call people and Dial randomly the lag is cruel and it will break no doubt about it soon

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC Touch Pro Windows Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: MRZ45L
Reviews.Content: It was in good shape and shipping was fast. It had a great screen and was easy to operate. I enjoyed using it for the time I had it.

Reviews.Title: Not what expected
Reviews.Author: Corine
Reviews.Content: I would go with no star but had to rate to write,I purchased this phone for my son,It Was Supposed to be "New" as advertised...When I recieved it The battery cover was cracked ,the phone is"Used"!!

Reviews.Title: Would never suggest to anyone
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my old one and thought it would be good because it was a windows phone, but boy was I wrong! I should have paid more attention to the other comments on this one. When I tried to charge it the charger they sent with the "new" phone didn't even fit it. Don't waste the time or money on this one.

Reviews.Title: pammy
Reviews.Author: bambam
Reviews.Content: The reason i ordered the phone was to use it on straight talk but found out it is not compatibile and i returned the phone.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your $$$
Reviews.Author: FaithB
Reviews.Content: When I first got it I thought it was great because it was touch screen AND had a keyboard. But once I started using it, it sucked. My internet didn't work so I took it to sprint and they said since the phone was so old there was no point in paying for the internet since it would be slow. The phone in general is slow. The only good thing about this phone is the quality of the pictures. But that's it. I'm ordering a new phone off amazon until I get my upgrade in February.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: n.moin
Reviews.Content: Very bad phone, the back looked taped. It only lasted 4 months and now i have to replace it. The touch screen is very slow and doesn't properly go to the right buttons.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Ryen
Reviews.Content: This phone absolutly sucks, the phone is completly out of date, i had the phone for one day and the touchscreen didnt work, this phone sucks and i would not reccommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Dated
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I broke my evo and had to get a replacement to hold me over because I did not want to use my upgrade since the iPhone 5 will be released soon.  Phone is dated which was to be expected.  It's a windows based phone that lacks a lot of functionality. I would not recommend it as a long term phone for anyone.

Reviews.Title: phone doesnt work well
Reviews.Author: froglovinfunny1
Reviews.Content: Only thing that works is calling and text msgs.after taking the phone into sprint and doing all possible updates internet only works on wifi and you can't send pictures.this is a phone issue sprint says after all the work they did at the tech center

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE PHONE
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE NO LONGER CHARGES. SO I REPLACED THE CHARGER AND THAT WASN'T THE PROBLEM IT'S THE PHONE SO I HAD TO BUY ANOTHER ONE.

Reviews.Title: Sprint HTC Touch Pro Windows Phone
Reviews.Author: DHL "dazecuttiebaby"
Reviews.Content: I had a blackberry prior to this phone and this one sucks. It's hard to navigate and screen is small. There's also not very many apps out there for Windows compared to the Androids.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: isela
Reviews.Content: The phone is nice and small... I bought it for my brother and he was confused at first but now he say's he really like the phone. The phone is 2 years old but he liked it.

Reviews.Title: PRODUCT REVIEW/CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Betty Wilkes
Reviews.Content: The product was awful, but the seller did refund my money after sending 2 replacements that also did not work.

Reviews.Title: I never got to enjoy it
Reviews.Author: Olga
Reviews.Content: The phone was a gift and got stolen before I could enjoy all the features so I can not give a full review.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT GET
Reviews.Author: katheryn
Reviews.Content: HORRIBLE CELL PHONE! DO NOT GET! I HAD IT FOR A DAY AND THE NEXT I DROPPED ON GRASS...AND STOPPED WORKING! DO NOT LOSE YOUR MONEY ON THIS CHEAP *ISHH!!

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: good phone and good price. it is reliable and it makes me happy. it was for sure a good purchase for me.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: Tiger
Reviews.Content: Had it for a month, went to play a youtube video and it just crashed, I don't like the phone anyways it is a pain to use if you have large hands and fingers.

Reviews.Title: I GUESSSS
Reviews.Author: CONNIE FROM 3 RIVERS MI
Reviews.Content: I GUESS I WONT BE BUYING THIS PHONE...WOW THE REVIEWS ARE VERY HELPFUL IN DECIDING YA OR NAY...I ORDERED THE SAMSUNG RANT FOR A FRIEND  OF MINE AND THE ONLY COMPLAINT HE HAD ON IT WAS WHEN YOU SLIDE IT OPEN FOR THE KEY BOARD ONLY HALF OF IT LIGHTS UP...AT LEAST AMAZON STANDS BEHIND THEIR PRODUTS IF YOU SEND THEM BACK..

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks!!!
Reviews.Author: Sheryl
Reviews.Content: I will never purchase this phone again, it was to small, the charger it came with had a short in it and the phone overall SUCKS!!! I will never order from this company again EVER!!!!

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: tabitha
Reviews.Content: this phone sucks it freezes a lot and it heats up very quickly and not to mention it dies very fast and i hate it!

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Armando
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone at a great price. It's an older phone, but it works really well, and it's great for a person who likes to have their day planned. It is a bit complicated, but I quickly learned how to do basic things just by messing around with it.

Reviews.Title: not in origional packing
Reviews.Author: manny
Reviews.Content: Phone looks to be new, but the box, wall charger and even directions appears to be aftermarket. The stylus is not included, but I did research before my purchase and it was supposed to come with one. Be careful when removing the back cover because its cheap thin plastic and will break easy. Speaker phone is really low. Overall its A nice phone for the price but i would have never paid the 300+ the phone went for 4 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Good podect
Reviews.Author: Hadee
Reviews.Content: I bought that phone for one of my friendsAnd he said it was very goodThe sipping time take longer than I expect,But it's ok

Reviews.Title: htc phone
Reviews.Author: tachelle
Reviews.Content: phone is ok it was new but since ive had it its been giving me nothing but problems it acts up text messages says im texting in year of 1995 to 2018 trynna get online be crazy websites im normally getting on this phone wont go on etc its alot of negative then positive with this phone to me wasnt worth my money but i suck up my lost seeing its a 2008 phone i guess

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Yba
Reviews.Content: i broke my phone and i needed a replacement so i got this one and it does well oohhh and go with what you want k ?

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: Although the product did not work and I had to send the product back, I did get my money back.

ProductInfo.Features:
Touch screen
Bluetooth Wireless
3.2 MP Camera
3g Internet with E-mail
For use on Sprint network only in the USA. Clean ESN.
ProductInfo.Name: Sprint HTC Touch Pro Windows Smart Phone
